/* HUB 센터 소식 갯수 조회 */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KB_HUB_DAY_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND HUB_TTL LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR HUB_CN LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
AND HUB_TTL LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
AND HUB_TTL LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'

SELECT HUB_PAGE.HUB_SN , HUB_PAGE.HUB_TTL , REPLACE(REPLACE( REPLACE(REPLACE(HUB_PAGE.HUB_CN, '/kbinnovationhub_devadm/', #{staticPath}), '\kbinnovationhub_devadm\', #{staticPath}) , '/kbinnovationhub_adm/', #{staticPath}), '\kbinnovationhub_adm\', #{staticPath}) AS HUB_CN , HUB_PAGE.ATCH_FILE_SN1 , HUB_PAGE.HUB_PATH_IMG , HUB_PAGE.HUB_IMG_NAME , HUB_PAGE.ATCH_FILE_SN2 , HUB_PAGE.HUB_PATH_MOV , HUB_PAGE.HUB_MOV_NAME , HUB_PAGE.ATCH_FILE_SN3 , HUB_PAGE.HUB_PATH , HUB_PAGE.HUB_FILE_NAME , HUB_PAGE.ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , HUB_PAGE.FRST_REG_DT , HUB_PAGE.CTGRY , HUB_PAGE.HUB_SN_BEF , HUB_PAGE.HUB_TTL_BEF , HUB_PAGE.ATCH_FILE_SN1_BEF , HUB_PAGE.HUB_SN_AFT , HUB_PAGE.HUB_TTL_AFT , HUB_PAGE.ATCH_FILE_SN1_AFT FROM ( /* 리스트 조회 */ SELECT HUB.HUB_SN AS HUB_SN , HUB.HUB_TTL AS HUB_TTL , HUB.HUB_CN AS HUB_CN , HUB.ATCH_FILE_SN1 AS ATCH_FILE_SN1 , REPLACE(FILES1.FILE_PATH, '\', '/') AS HUB_PATH_IMG , FILES1.FILE_NM AS HUB_IMG_NAME , HUB.ATCH_FILE_SN2 AS ATCH_FILE_SN2 , REPLACE(FILES2.FILE_PATH, '\', '/') AS HUB_PATH_MOV , FILES2.FILE_NM AS HUB_MOV_NAME , HUB.ATCH_FILE_SN3 AS ATCH_FILE_SN3 , REPLACE(FILES3.FILE_PATH, '\', '/') AS HUB_PATH , FILES3.FILE_NM AS HUB_FILE_NAME , FILES3.ORGNL_FILE_NM AS ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , TO_CHAR(HUB.FRST_REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS FRST_REG_DT , HUB.CTGRY AS CTGRY , LAG(HUB.HUB_SN, 1) OVER(ORDER BY HUB.SORT_NO) AS HUB_SN_BEF , LAG(HUB.HUB_TTL, 1) OVER(ORDER BY HUB.SORT_NO) AS HUB_TTL_BEF , LAG(HUB.ATCH_FILE_SN1, 1) OVER(ORDER BY HUB.SORT_NO) AS ATCH_FILE_SN1_BEF , LEAD(HUB.HUB_SN, 1) OVER(ORDER BY HUB.SORT_NO) AS HUB_SN_AFT , LEAD(HUB.HUB_TTL, 1) OVER(ORDER BY HUB.SORT_NO) AS HUB_TTL_AFT , LEAD(HUB.ATCH_FILE_SN1, 1) OVER(ORDER BY HUB.SORT_NO) AS ATCH_FILE_SN1_AFT FROM KB_HUB_DAY_INFO HUB , KB_FILE_INFO FILES1 , KB_FILE_INFO FILES2 , KB_FILE_INFO FILES3 WHERE HUB.ATCH_FILE_SN1 = FILES1.FILE_SN(+) AND HUB.ATCH_FILE_SN2 = FILES2.FILE_SN(+) AND HUB.ATCH_FILE_SN3 = FILES3.FILE_SN(+) AND HUB.EXPSR_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY HUB.SORT_NO, HUB.HUB_SN DESC ) HUB_PAGE WHERE HUB_PAGE.HUB_SN = #{hub_sn}
